logout_prompt: Are you sure you want to log out?
no_messages_alexandria: No messages in Alexandria chat yet.
report_reason: Please provide a reason for reporting this message:
report_reason_required: Please provide a reason for the report
support_help_text: Our support team is here to help you with any issues you may have. Please describe your problem in detail and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
google_signin_failed: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.
logout_failed: Failed to logout. Please try again.
confirm_ban_user: Are you sure you want to ban this user? They will not be able to chat in any city.
you_are_banned: You are banned from participating in city chats. You can still use the support chat.
confirm_unban_user: Are you sure you want to unban this user? They will be able to participate in city chats again.
reset_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
reset_password_email_sent: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.
reset_password_failed: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.

safety_instructions.1: Stay away from low-lying areas, valleys, and waterways as they are most prone to flooding.
safety_instructions.2: Do not cross closed or flooded roads or bridges, as the current may be strong and invisible.
safety_instructions.3: Continuously follow weather forecasts and meteorological warnings.
safety_instructions.4: Evacuate your home if ordered to do so and head to safe locations or designated shelters.
safety_instructions.5: Avoid touching or approaching wet or fallen electrical wires to prevent electric shock.
safety_instructions.6: Turn off electricity, gas, and water sources before leaving the home.
safety_instructions.7: Avoid driving on flooded roads, as water may reach the engine, causing the vehicle to stall or be swept away by currents.
safety_instructions.8: Keep emergency supplies such as water, dry food, a flashlight, extra batteries, and emergency medications.
safety_instructions.9: Stay calm, avoid panic, and keep away from sources of danger.
